content.raw:
I've tested with several configurations, and I've found that the following seem to work:

* Precise, gazebo (1.9.5), sdformat (1.4.11)
* Trusty, gazebo3 (3.0.0), libsdformat2 (2.0.0)
* Mac homebrew, gazebo 3.0.0, sdformat 2.0.0

The only time I see the issue is on trusty with gazebo2 (2.2.2-4~trusty) and libsdformat1 (1.4.11-1). This version of sdformat is also using the system version of urdfdom.

@\_jrivero_
content.html:
I've tested with several configurations, and I've found that the following seem to work:

  • Precise, gazebo (1.9.5), sdformat (1.4.11)
  • Trusty, gazebo3 (3.0.0), libsdformat2 (2.0.0)
  • Mac homebrew, gazebo 3.0.0, sdformat 2.0.0

The only time I see the issue is on trusty with gazebo2 (2.2.2-4~trusty) and libsdformat1 (1.4.11-1). This version of sdformat is also using the system version of urdfdom.

@_jrivero_
